snippet.title: Toads of the Bayou - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Take a look at gameplay and more from Toads of the Bayou in this trailer for the upcoming game featuring a mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike deckbuilding. In Toads of the Bayou, lead a group of toads as they fight against Baron Samedi’s evil forces. Synergize card effects, build a settlement and engage in strategic combat to thrive in the cursed bayou. Signups for a closed playtest of Toads of the Bayou are available now.

#GameTrailers #SoG #Gaming
